structured.description: A FastAPI application with CORS support and establishes a connection to a database using SQLAlchemy. It loads environment variables from a .env file, creates the database tables specified by the models, and sets up two routers for users and remember functionality.

items.description: Maps an HTTP GET request to the root URL (`"/"`) and returns a JSON response with a message `"hello world!"`. It is asynchronous, allowing it to run concurrently with other tasks.

returns.description: A dictionary containing a single key-value pair, where the key is 'message' and the value is the string 'hello world!'. This response will be returned as the HTTP response to GET requests made to the root URL.

items.name: root
